                                                                    More Contact InformationHOUSINGCurrent page:  How to Apply
                                        
    		How to Apply
    	Before Applying for HousingGet Admitted to California State University, ChicoComplete and submit your application for admission to Chico State.After being accepted, activate your CSU, Chico Account. You can activate your portal account by going to the CSU Chico home page, click PORTAL near the top of the page and follow the New Student Account link.Apply for Housing Today!Learn About Our CommunitiesWhen you fill out the housing application we will ask you for your preferred communities make sure you learn about our Communities before you apply.Read our License AgreementYou will sign this legally binding while filling out the application.  Once signed you are bound to the terms and conditions.Review our Room and Board RatesHousing payments are due in 8 installments (4 per semester).  Please carefully review the published rates and installment due dates.Read our Policy GuideYou will be expected to abide by all University Housing policies. Failure to do so could result in termination of your license agreement.Review the Housing Application TimelineThis is where you will learn about when you will get to participate in roommate matching, get your room assignment, enter the parking lottery, and more.Why Live in University Housing?We know that this year has presented multiple challenges, but we're here to make sure your housing isn't one of them! University Housing provides 24/7 on-call professional staff, reliable high-speed Internet, meal plan included and all utilities are included. Also, no credit check or cosigner is required!University Housing welcomes all students to apply. Sutter, Shasta, Lassen, Esken, Mechoopda, and Konkow are where first-time freshmen live.  University Village is where first-time freshmen, second-year, and transfer students live.Click the Apply for Housing Button, located beneath the left sidebar. You must activate your CSU Chico account beforehand and be sure to allow Pop-Ups in your browser for our site. Once you’ve logged in, fill out all profile questions and preferences.Watch our Housing Info Session belowAfter ApplyingSubmit Your Intent to EnrollIn order to be placed in the priority placement lottery submit your intent to enroll by end of day on April 16th, 2023.  All Done?Please make sure to check your Chico State Wildcat email often for communications and assignment instructions from University Housing. Have Questions?Attend a Virtual Info SessionWe will be hosting multiple info sessions. Register to attend one of our University Housing Info Sessions.Find out about what we offer, information on the application process for the 2023-24 school year, and why living with us is a great experience!Vice President for Student AffairsKendall Hall, Room 110530-898-6131www.csuchico.edu/saDivision of Student AffairsAccessibility Resource CenterAssociated StudentsBasic Needs ProjectCareer CenterEquity, Diversity & InclusionEarly Outreach & Support ProgramsEnrollment Management ServicesFinancial Aid & ScholarshipsIntercollegiate AthleticsOff-Campus Student ServicesStudent Conduct, Rights & ResponsibilitiesStudent Life & LeadershipUniversity HousingWellCat Services
We acknowledge and are mindful that Chico State stands on lands that were originally occupied by the first people of this area, Mechoopda, and we recognize their distinctive spiritual relationship with this land, the flora, the fauna, and the waters that run through campus. We are humbled that our campus resides upon sacred lands that since time immemorial have sustained the Mechoopda people and continue to do so today.Contact UsNeed Help?FacebookFacebookTwitterTwitterInstagramInstagramReport an accessibility issueReport a broken link on this pageTitle IXPrivacy PolicyCalifornia State University, Chico400 West First StreetChico, CA 95929Copyright © 2023 All Rights Reserved
